item.title: Hawksford has released the latest data on new business formations in Singapore for the fourth quarter of 2015
item.description: Source: Hawksford report. Data represents the shareholder’s country of origin.Â Although the final quarter of 2015 saw a decrease in new Singaporean company formations compared to the previous quarter and the same period last year, international investors continue to set up companies and subsidiaries in Singapore, according to Hawksford, a provider of corporate, private client, and fund administration services. Hawksford notes this decline is typical for the fourth quarter. Private limited companies made up the largest portion of new formations at 48.
